Treatment consists of an antibiotic eye drop or ointment for 8 days. In cases resistant to treatment or in encysted forms, incision at the free edge may be necessary. This is carried out under local anaesthetic on an outpatient basis.

properties.question: What is the initial treatment for a stye?
properties.option_b: Application of antibiotic eye drop or ointment for 8 days
properties.option_c: Cold compress applied to the affected eye for 24 hours
properties.option_d: Incision at the free edge of the eyelid under general anaesthesia
